template_info.name: Psychic-Type Collective
template_info.description: A cerebral psychic team focused on special attacks, status moves, and mental manipulation
template_info.usage_notes: Psychic types dominate with special attacks and status moves. Use Calm Mind to set up sweeps and disable moves to disrupt opponents.

pokemon.name: alakazam
pokemon.strategy: Ultimate special attacker with setup potential
pokemon.tips: Set up Calm Mind when safe, then sweep with boosted Psychic

pokemon.name: mewtwo
pokemon.strategy: Overwhelming psychic power with perfect coverage
pokemon.tips: Shadow Ball and Aura Sphere cover dark and steel weaknesses

pokemon.name: hypno
pokemon.strategy: Sleep-based strategy with dream eater combo
pokemon.tips: Hypnosis + Dream Eater provides damage and healing simultaneously

pokemon.name: slowbro
pokemon.strategy: Bulky water/psychic with special defense setup
pokemon.tips: Amnesia makes it nearly immune to special attacks

pokemon.name: mr-mime
pokemon.strategy: Support specialist with screens and stat boosts
pokemon.tips: Set up Barrier and Light Screen to support the whole team

pokemon.name: jynx
pokemon.strategy: Fast special attacker with sleep and perish song
pokemon.tips: Lovely Kiss has high accuracy and sets up for powerful attacks
